item.review: Came here last night and I do not regret it one bit! The food was good, and the service was amazing.
item.name: Judy Ann A.

item.review: The service here is amazing as well as the food! I have been here quite a few times and enjoyed every dish so far.
item.name: Philip G.

item.review: Love the food here!! It is incredibly flavorful and come piping hot from the kitchen.
item.name: Ignacio M.

item.review: They have impeccable service and wonderful food! Don't forget to try their Milk Tea, it's the BEST!! Planning on eating here for many more years.
item.name: Krystal D.

item.review: Everything was delicious, the service was friendly and the restraunt was clean. We are looking forward to going again some time soon.
item.name: Kelly S.

item.review: What a pleasant find this was! I recommend the dumplings for sure- very tasty! The Red Moon beef was so satisfying with steamed rice! I'm definitely coming back!
item.name: Bernadette N.

item.review: Mae is a fantastic hostess; her husband runs the kitchen to perfection, he serves some really fantastic dishes. The motto, hot and fast, and YUMMMMM!
item.name: Clark H.

item.review: Favorite restaurant in San Diego! Not only is their food amazing but the service is really top notch. The owners are so sweet and always so accommodating.
item.name: Johanna L.

item.review: Wow! My husband and I tried this place on a whim and I couldn't be more impressed. The food is SO FRESH, and delicious. This place has some of the best food in San Diego and you won't be disappointed.
item.name: Sarah M.
